uvi.product_version: versions from v2.6.28 to before v4.9.287
uvi.description:
phy: mdio: fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.287 by commit 2250392d930bd0d989f24d355d6355b0150256e7, it was introduced in version v2.6.28 by commit 46abc02175b3c246dd5141d878f565a8725060c9. For more details please see the references link.
